sect2.title: Installation of uClibc Headers
sect2.para: By default uClibc symlinks all its headers from the source, we will change this behavious with the following sed:

screen.userinput: cp Makefile Makefile.orig sed -e 's/$(LN) -fs/cp/g' Makefile.orig > Makefile for file in `find libc/sysdeps/linux -name Makefile`; do cp $file $file.orig sed -e 's/$(LN) -fs/cp/g' -e 's@../libc/@$(TOPDIR)libc/@g' $file.orig > $file done
